sections.heading: Use
sections.text:
or possession of device, software or hardware to obtain advantage at playing

game prohibited.

sections.heading: Possession,
sections.text:
use, sale or manufacture of counterfeit, unapproved or unlawful instruments or

items; possession of certain unlawful devices or paraphernalia for

manufacturing slugs.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text:
manufacture, sale, distribution, marking, altering or modification of equipment

and devices associated with gaming; unlawful instruction.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text:
receipt of compensation for accepting bets or wagers upon result of certain

events without required gaming licenses.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text: dissemination of information concerning racing; exemptions; penalty.

sections.heading: Accepting,
sections.text:
receiving or allowing another to accept or receive wager from person physically

present in this state prohibited under certain circumstances; penalty.

sections.heading: Placing,
sections.text:
sending, transmitting or relaying wagers to another person prohibited under

certain circumstances; penalty.

sections.heading: Detention
sections.text:
and questioning of person suspected of violating chapter; limitations on

liability; posting of notice.

sections.heading: Disposition
sections.text: of evidence seized by agent of Nevada Gaming Control Board.
